hotels.name: Desert Rock
hotels.desc: Luxury resort carved into mountain, sustainable design, renewable energy, nature-integrated villas
hotels.longDesc: A stunning eco-luxury resort seamlessly integrated into Saudi Arabia's Red Sea landscape, featuring 64 villas powered entirely by renewable energy with minimalist design principles.
